import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";

import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Repository Branches with CICD Runs</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/code/api/v1/repositories/branches"}></MethodEndpoint>



Get a list with all the repositories branches for the requesting customer
The returned branches are branches that has at list one CICD runs
each branches item includes: name, creationDate, CICD status

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Query Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"in":"query","name":"repoOwner","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"in":"query","name":"repoName","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

repository branches

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem \"defaultBranch\": true,\n      \"name\": \"master\"\n    }\n  ],\n  \"source\": \"Gitlab\"\n}"}
